content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":254512,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tジュリアはツアーコンダクター","translatedEnglishLine":"Julia is a tour conductor"},{"lineNumber":254513,"originalJapaneseLine":"人生浪漫通りを進む","translatedEnglishLine":"Proceeding along Romance Avenue of Life"},{"lineNumber":254514,"originalJapaneseLine":"商店街で買い物","translatedEnglishLine":"Shopping in the shopping street"},{"lineNumber":254515,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tプリティリアに到着","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrived at Prettyria"},{"lineNumber":254516,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tリア女王の名を冠した都市","translatedEnglishLine":"A city named after Queen Ria"},{"lineNumber":254517,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tジュリアのお店説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Julia's shop explanation"},{"lineNumber":254518,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tリックとランスの会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation between Rick and Rance"},{"lineNumber":254519,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、北部の戦場","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, the northern battlefield"},{"lineNumber":254520,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t赤軍（メナド）、白軍（エクス）","translatedEnglishLine":"Red Army (Menado), White Army (Ex)"},{"lineNumber":254521,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔軍との戦い","translatedEnglishLine":"The battle against the demon army"},{"lineNumber":254522,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、北部の戦場","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, the northern battlefield"},{"lineNumber":254523,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔軍側の様子","translatedEnglishLine":"Situation on the demon army's side"},{"lineNumber":254524,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人ハウゼル、火炎書士","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Hausel, the fire sorcerer"},{"lineNumber":254525,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそれを見ている魔人サイゼル、ユキ","translatedEnglishLine":"Demons Saizel and Yuki watching it"},{"lineNumber":254526,"originalJapaneseLine":"大都市スケールに到着","translatedEnglishLine":"Arriving at the large city Scale"},{"lineNumber":254527,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tエクス将軍と対面","translatedEnglishLine":"Meeting General Ex"},{"lineNumber":254528,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tリックが戦線復帰","translatedEnglishLine":"Rick returns to the front lines"},{"lineNumber":254529,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人ハウゼルは今戦場に居る","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Hausel is now on the battlefield"},{"lineNumber":254530,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tすぐに出撃","translatedEnglishLine":"Deploy immediately"},{"lineNumber":254531,"originalJapaneseLine":"場面が変わって、ランスが前線に立った。","translatedEnglishLine":"The scene changes; Rance stands at the front line."},{"lineNumber":254532,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルはどこだ・・うーん、見えんな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Where is Hausel... hmm, I can't see him."},{"lineNumber":254533,"originalJapaneseLine":"雑魚敵でも倒しながら捜すか","translatedEnglishLine":"Shall I look for him while defeating weak enemies?"},{"lineNumber":254534,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場の途中","translatedEnglishLine":"Midway through the battlefield"},{"lineNumber":254535,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルの話","translatedEnglishLine":"Story about Hausel"},{"lineNumber":254536,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラからの情報、ハウゼルの性格や容姿など、そしてサイゼルという姉妹が居る","translatedEnglishLine":"Information from Satera: Hausel's personality, appearance, and that he has a sister named Saizel."},{"lineNumber":254537,"originalJapaneseLine":"サイゼルはケイブリス側についていたので姉妹で敵対していた","translatedEnglishLine":"Saizel sided with Keivris, so the sisters were enemies."},{"lineNumber":254538,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがサイゼルを倒した事があるという話","translatedEnglishLine":"The story that Rance once defeated Saizel."},{"lineNumber":254539,"originalJapaneseLine":"エッチはしてない、あの時は・・ちんこ凍ってあああーもったいない","translatedEnglishLine":"We didn’t have sex then... my dick froze, ahhh—what a waste."},{"lineNumber":254540,"originalJapaneseLine":"今度はやろう、そうだハウゼルと姉妹丼だー","translatedEnglishLine":"Next time we will do it—yeah, a trio with Hausel and the sisters!"},{"lineNumber":254541,"originalJapaneseLine":"（サイゼルを思い出す際は過去シーンの絵をセピアで出すのもいいかな、シナリオ側で","translatedEnglishLine":"(When recalling Saizel, it might be nice to show past scenes in sepia tone—handled on the scenario side,"},{"lineNumber":254542,"originalJapaneseLine":"　必要なら発注して下さい）","translatedEnglishLine":" please order if necessary.)"},{"lineNumber":254543,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tリーザス兵とハウゼルの戦いの様子","translatedEnglishLine":"The fight between Leesass soldiers and Hausel"},{"lineNumber":254544,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の中にひときわ目立つ存在、ハウゼルを見つける","translatedEnglishLine":"Among the demon army, a conspicuous figure, spotting Hausel"},{"lineNumber":254545,"originalJapaneseLine":"美人みっけー、サテラあれだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Found a beauty—so that’s Satera."},{"lineNumber":254546,"originalJapaneseLine":"ええ、ハウゼルです。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, it’s Hausel."},{"lineNumber":254547,"originalJapaneseLine":"よーしとランスがハウゼルに向かって突撃する","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, Rance charges toward Hausel."},{"lineNumber":254548,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだ遠い場所です、このイベントの後、移動シーンをいくつか挟んで","translatedEnglishLine":"He is still far away; after this event, some travel scenes will be inserted."},{"lineNumber":254549,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルに接触します","translatedEnglishLine":"We will make contact with Hausel."},{"lineNumber":254550,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス軍とハウゼルが戦っている所に到着","translatedEnglishLine":"Arriving at the place where the Leesass army and Hausel are fighting."},{"lineNumber":254551,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだ戦っている、乱入しますかと言われるが","translatedEnglishLine":"They are still fighting; asked if I want to jump in,"},{"lineNumber":254552,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、待とうと　　ＭＭＯのボス戦順番待ちみたいな雰囲気、","translatedEnglishLine":"No, I'll wait—a mood like waiting in line for a boss battle in an MMO,"},{"lineNumber":254553,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そろそろ終わりそうですね、やっぱり魔人には勝てないようですよ","translatedEnglishLine":"It looks like it's about to end; after all, you can't win against a demon."},{"lineNumber":254554,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あたりまえだ俺とカオスでないと無理だな","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course, it’s impossible unless it’s me and Chaos."},{"lineNumber":254555,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう１部隊、近くにいますが、今の部隊が敗走したらすぐに変わって","translatedEnglishLine":"There is another unit nearby; if this one retreats, they will immediately take over."},{"lineNumber":254556,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ハウゼルと戦うつもりみたいですよ","translatedEnglishLine":"They intend to fight Hausel."},{"lineNumber":254557,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シィル、そいつらに言っておけ、次は俺様がやるから手出しするなと","translatedEnglishLine":"Siil, tell them that next time it'll be me, so don’t interfere."},{"lineNumber":254558,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦いは終わったリーザス軍が敗走していく、","translatedEnglishLine":"The battle ends; the Leesass army retreats."},{"lineNumber":254559,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、俺の番だと向かおうとしたら・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, it’s my turn. When I tried to approach..."},{"lineNumber":254560,"originalJapaneseLine":"横からサイゼルが突っ込んできた","translatedEnglishLine":"Saizel barged in from the side."},{"lineNumber":254561,"originalJapaneseLine":"順番抜かしをされた感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"Feels like being skipped in line."},{"lineNumber":254562,"originalJapaneseLine":"この時、サイゼルはランスには気がついていない","translatedEnglishLine":"At this moment, Saizel hasn’t noticed Rance."},{"lineNumber":254563,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルの前に来たサイゼルは、いろいろ語りハウゼルを説得しようとする","translatedEnglishLine":"Saizel, having come before Hausel, speaks various things trying to persuade him."},{"lineNumber":254564,"originalJapaneseLine":"が・・この姉妹、意思疎通が下手でいつも喧嘩になる","translatedEnglishLine":"But... these sisters are bad at communicating and always end up fighting."},{"lineNumber":254565,"originalJapaneseLine":"今回も喧嘩になり戦闘が始まる","translatedEnglishLine":"This time too, they start fighting and the battle begins."},{"lineNumber":254566,"originalJapaneseLine":"サイゼルｖｓハウゼル","translatedEnglishLine":"Saizel vs Hausel"},{"lineNumber":254567,"originalJapaneseLine":"炎と氷、激しい戦い・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Fire and ice, a fierce battle..."},{"lineNumber":254568,"originalJapaneseLine":"順番抜かしされた、また相手にされていない感じがむかつくランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Having been passed over in line, Rance is irritated by being ignored again."},{"lineNumber":254569,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Choice"},{"lineNumber":254570,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　乱入する","translatedEnglishLine":"> Join the fight"},{"lineNumber":254571,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　もう少し見ている","translatedEnglishLine":"> Watch a little longer"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジュリアはツアーコンダクター
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Julia is a tour conductor

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人生浪漫通りを進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Proceeding along Romance Avenue of Life

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 商店街で買い物
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shopping in the shopping street

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プリティリアに到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at Prettyria

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア女王の名を冠した都市
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A city named after Queen Ria

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジュリアのお店説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Julia's shop explanation

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックとランスの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between Rick and Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、北部の戦場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the northern battlefield

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤軍（メナド）、白軍（エクス）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Red Army (Menado), White Army (Ex)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍との戦い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle against the demon army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、北部の戦場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the northern battlefield

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍側の様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Situation on the demon army's side

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ハウゼル、火炎書士
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Hausel, the fire sorcerer

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見ている魔人サイゼル、ユキ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demons Saizel and Yuki watching it

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大都市スケールに到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arriving at the large city Scale

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エクス将軍と対面
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meeting General Ex

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックが戦線復帰
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick returns to the front lines

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ハウゼルは今戦場に居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Hausel is now on the battlefield

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに出撃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Deploy immediately

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 場面が変わって、ランスが前線に立った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The scene changes; Rance stands at the front line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルはどこだ・・うーん、見えんな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where is Hausel... hmm, I can't see him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雑魚敵でも倒しながら捜すか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall I look for him while defeating weak enemies?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場の途中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Midway through the battlefield

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルの話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Story about Hausel

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラからの情報、ハウゼルの性格や容姿など、そしてサイゼルという姉妹が居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information from Satera: Hausel's personality, appearance, and that he has a sister named Saizel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイゼルはケイブリス側についていたので姉妹で敵対していた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saizel sided with Keivris, so the sisters were enemies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがサイゼルを倒した事があるという話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The story that Rance once defeated Saizel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エッチはしてない、あの時は・・ちんこ凍ってあああーもったいない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We didn’t have sex then... my dick froze, ahhh—what a waste.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今度はやろう、そうだハウゼルと姉妹丼だー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next time we will do it—yeah, a trio with Hausel and the sisters!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （サイゼルを思い出す際は過去シーンの絵をセピアで出すのもいいかな、シナリオ側で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (When recalling Saizel, it might be nice to show past scenes in sepia tone—handled on the scenario side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必要なら発注して下さい）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please order if necessary.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス兵とハウゼルの戦いの様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fight between Leesass soldiers and Hausel

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の中にひときわ目立つ存在、ハウゼルを見つける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among the demon army, a conspicuous figure, spotting Hausel

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美人みっけー、サテラあれだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Found a beauty—so that’s Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ええ、ハウゼルです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, it’s Hausel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よーしとランスがハウゼルに向かって突撃する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, Rance charges toward Hausel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ遠い場所です、このイベントの後、移動シーンをいくつか挟んで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is still far away; after this event, some travel scenes will be inserted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルに接触します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will make contact with Hausel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍とハウゼルが戦っている所に到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arriving at the place where the Leesass army and Hausel are fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ戦っている、乱入しますかと言われるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are still fighting; asked if I want to jump in,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、待とうと　　ＭＭＯのボス戦順番待ちみたいな雰囲気、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I'll wait—a mood like waiting in line for a boss battle in an MMO,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろ終わりそうですね、やっぱり魔人には勝てないようですよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like it's about to end; after all, you can't win against a demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あたりまえだ俺とカオスでないと無理だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, it’s impossible unless it’s me and Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう１部隊、近くにいますが、今の部隊が敗走したらすぐに変わって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is another unit nearby; if this one retreats, they will immediately take over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルと戦うつもりみたいですよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They intend to fight Hausel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、そいつらに言っておけ、次は俺様がやるから手出しするなと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Siil, tell them that next time it'll be me, so don’t interfere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いは終わったリーザス軍が敗走していく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle ends; the Leesass army retreats.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、俺の番だと向かおうとしたら・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, it’s my turn. When I tried to approach...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 横からサイゼルが突っ込んできた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saizel barged in from the side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 順番抜かしをされた感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Feels like being skipped in line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この時、サイゼルはランスには気がついていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this moment, Saizel hasn’t noticed Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルの前に来たサイゼルは、いろいろ語りハウゼルを説得しようとする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saizel, having come before Hausel, speaks various things trying to persuade him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が・・この姉妹、意思疎通が下手でいつも喧嘩になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But... these sisters are bad at communicating and always end up fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回も喧嘩になり戦闘が始まる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time too, they start fighting and the battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイゼルｖｓハウゼル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saizel vs Hausel

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 炎と氷、激しい戦い・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fire and ice, a fierce battle...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 順番抜かしされた、また相手にされていない感じがむかつくランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having been passed over in line, Rance is irritated by being ignored again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　乱入する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Join the fight

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　もう少し見ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Watch a little longer

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジュリアはツアーコンダクター
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Julia is a tour conductor

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人生浪漫通りを進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Proceeding along Romance Avenue of Life

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 商店街で買い物
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shopping in the shopping street

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プリティリアに到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at Prettyria

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア女王の名を冠した都市
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A city named after Queen Ria

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジュリアのお店説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Julia's shop explanation

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックとランスの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between Rick and Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、北部の戦場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the northern battlefield

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤軍（メナド）、白軍（エクス）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Red Army (Menado), White Army (Ex)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍との戦い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle against the demon army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、北部の戦場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the northern battlefield

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍側の様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Situation on the demon army's side

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ハウゼル、火炎書士
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Hausel, the fire sorcerer

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見ている魔人サイゼル、ユキ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demons Saizel and Yuki watching it

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大都市スケールに到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arriving at the large city Scale

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エクス将軍と対面
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meeting General Ex

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リックが戦線復帰
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick returns to the front lines

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ハウゼルは今戦場に居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Hausel is now on the battlefield

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに出撃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Deploy immediately

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 場面が変わって、ランスが前線に立った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The scene changes; Rance stands at the front line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルはどこだ・・うーん、見えんな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where is Hausel... hmm, I can't see him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雑魚敵でも倒しながら捜すか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall I look for him while defeating weak enemies?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場の途中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Midway through the battlefield

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルの話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Story about Hausel

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラからの情報、ハウゼルの性格や容姿など、そしてサイゼルという姉妹が居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information from Satera: Hausel's personality, appearance, and that he has a sister named Saizel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイゼルはケイブリス側についていたので姉妹で敵対していた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saizel sided with Keivris, so the sisters were enemies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがサイゼルを倒した事があるという話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The story that Rance once defeated Saizel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エッチはしてない、あの時は・・ちんこ凍ってあああーもったいない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We didn’t have sex then... my dick froze, ahhh—what a waste.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今度はやろう、そうだハウゼルと姉妹丼だー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next time we will do it—yeah, a trio with Hausel and the sisters!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （サイゼルを思い出す際は過去シーンの絵をセピアで出すのもいいかな、シナリオ側で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (When recalling Saizel, it might be nice to show past scenes in sepia tone—handled on the scenario side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必要なら発注して下さい）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please order if necessary.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス兵とハウゼルの戦いの様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fight between Leesass soldiers and Hausel

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の中にひときわ目立つ存在、ハウゼルを見つける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among the demon army, a conspicuous figure, spotting Hausel

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美人みっけー、サテラあれだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Found a beauty—so that’s Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ええ、ハウゼルです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, it’s Hausel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よーしとランスがハウゼルに向かって突撃する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, Rance charges toward Hausel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ遠い場所です、このイベントの後、移動シーンをいくつか挟んで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is still far away; after this event, some travel scenes will be inserted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルに接触します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will make contact with Hausel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍とハウゼルが戦っている所に到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arriving at the place where the Leesass army and Hausel are fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ戦っている、乱入しますかと言われるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are still fighting; asked if I want to jump in,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、待とうと　　ＭＭＯのボス戦順番待ちみたいな雰囲気、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I'll wait—a mood like waiting in line for a boss battle in an MMO,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろ終わりそうですね、やっぱり魔人には勝てないようですよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like it's about to end; after all, you can't win against a demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あたりまえだ俺とカオスでないと無理だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, it’s impossible unless it’s me and Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう１部隊、近くにいますが、今の部隊が敗走したらすぐに変わって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is another unit nearby; if this one retreats, they will immediately take over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルと戦うつもりみたいですよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They intend to fight Hausel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、そいつらに言っておけ、次は俺様がやるから手出しするなと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Siil, tell them that next time it'll be me, so don’t interfere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いは終わったリーザス軍が敗走していく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle ends; the Leesass army retreats.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、俺の番だと向かおうとしたら・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, it’s my turn. When I tried to approach...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 横からサイゼルが突っ込んできた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saizel barged in from the side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 順番抜かしをされた感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Feels like being skipped in line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この時、サイゼルはランスには気がついていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this moment, Saizel hasn’t noticed Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルの前に来たサイゼルは、いろいろ語りハウゼルを説得しようとする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saizel, having come before Hausel, speaks various things trying to persuade him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が・・この姉妹、意思疎通が下手でいつも喧嘩になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But... these sisters are bad at communicating and always end up fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回も喧嘩になり戦闘が始まる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time too, they start fighting and the battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイゼルｖｓハウゼル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saizel vs Hausel

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 炎と氷、激しい戦い・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fire and ice, a fierce battle...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 順番抜かしされた、また相手にされていない感じがむかつくランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having been passed over in line, Rance is irritated by being ignored again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　乱入する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Join the fight

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　もう少し見ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Watch a little longer
